Title: Relates to owner liability for failure of operator to stop at a stop sign or yield for a pedestrian as required by law in the counties of Monroe and Onondaga
Summary: Relates to owner liability for failure of operator to stop at a stop sign or yield for a pedestrian as required by law in any municipality in the counties of Monroe and Onondaga; provides that such demonstration program shall empower such municipality to install and operate stop sign and pedestrian crossing photo violation monitoring systems which may be stationary or mobile, and which may be installed within the boundaries of such municipality; makes related provisions.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public officers law, in relation to owner liability for failure of operator to stop at a stop sign or yield for a pedestrian as required by law in the counties of Monroe and Onondaga; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
